parameters.name: x
parameters.label: x
parameters.desc: Independent variables: A list of variables from database.

parameters.name: y
parameters.label: y
parameters.desc: Dependent variable: A variable from database.

parameters.name: n_trees
parameters.label: n_trees
parameters.desc: The number of trees in the forest.

parameters.name: n_features
parameters.label: n_features
parameters.desc: the number of features to sample and pass onto each tree, this is where feature bagging happens. It can either be sqrt, log2 or an integer. In case of sqrt, the number of features sampled to each tree is square root of total features and log base 2 of total features in case of log2

parameters.name: sample_percentage
parameters.label: sample_percentage
parameters.desc: sample_size: percentage of rows randomly selected and passed onto each tree. [0,1]

parameters.name: max_depth
parameters.label: max_depth
parameters.desc: The maximum depth of each tree. If Blank, then nodes are expanded until all leaves contain at least min_samples_split samples.

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.label: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology in which the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.label: dataset
parameters.desc: The names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.
